Text: Oñ i lewatu abu ku Mose̩s, adu Jihofa le̩, leku, Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua, o̩ma Nun kʼi ache e̩wñ ñwu Mose̩s le̩, kakini,
Mose̩s adu-mi la leku me̩; todule̩ uwe̩ ki kwane̩ kʼe̩ daba Jo̩rdan-i, uwe̩ kpai amone̩-i chaka, me̩ nyʼoj ane̩ kʼu nadu ñwu ma, owñ chʼamo̩ma Israe̩l-i.
Ugbo du kʼadaba e̩re̩-we̩ mʼane̩, uwe̩ omi du ñwu, alu kʼu ka ñwu Mose̩s le̩.
Akwo aje̩tachi kpai ane̩ Le̩bano̩n kide̩, gbogbo wʼohimini elile, owñ chʼohimini Yufretis, kpai ane̩ abo He̩t chaka gbogbo wʼOhimini Elile o̩wo̩ olane̩, e-le̩ chʼalo̩me̩-we̩.
I nʼene̩ du kʼi aneke gbʼo̩na nyʼuwe̩ o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-we̩ kade n; alu kʼu dʼugbo Mose̩s, alu le̩ nadʼugbo we̩ ge̩; nawe ehi iñmi kʼe̩ n, nahi uwe̩ tinyo̩ n.
Fʼeju gbiti kʼe̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩; todu uwe̩ aje̩ ñw amone̩-i je̩ ane̩ kʼu go̩ ñw amata-ma ka kʼu nadu ñwu ma-i e̩wñ ogu.

Fʼeju gbiti kate, kʼe̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ nana, kʼe̩ fejute̩ kʼe̩ che teju alu du kʼuko̩-o̩la ki Mose̩s, adu-mi, ñwa ñw e̩ le̩ ka; e̩ ki rida bʼo̩ te̩ tʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n, todu ki ra ñw e̩ ugbo du kʼuwe̩ anyi.

O̩la o̩takada uko̩-o̩la-i akwo bʼuwe̩ alu te̩ n, ama e̩ nayaye-wñ tʼo̩ro̩ka tʼodu, todu kʼuwe̩ ki dejute̩ kʼe̩ che teju alu du ku ma kʼo̩rubutu efu-wñ; todu e̩gbale̩ e̩wñ-we̩ kʼe̩ che anawo ñw e̩, e̩gbale̩ tak i ara ñw e̩.
I chʼomi ñwa ñw e̩ n? E̩ fʼeju gbiti kʼe̩ la fʼe̩do̩ ne̩; e̩ ki chokpo n, e̩do̩-we̩ ki da kpu n; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ dʼugbo we̩ ugbo du kʼuwe̩ anyi.
Taku Jo̩shua ñwa ñw amako̩takada amone̩ le̩ kakini,

Me̩ na le alumeji uru-i ku me̩ ka ñw amone̩ kakini, Me̩ fʼo̩na uje̩wñ che ñw o̩la-me̩; todu i ajo̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta tak ame̩ adaba Jo̩rdan-i kʼume̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ abʼuma gbʼane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ du ñwu me̩ ku me̩ ne̩-i n.
Taku Jo̩shua ka ñw abo Rube̩n, kpai abo Gad, kpai ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu abo Manasa kakini,
Me̩ nadibetʼo̩la e-ki Mose̩s adu Jihofa le̩ ñwa ñwu me̩, kakini, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ mʼuñmi du ñwu me̩ me̩, i laño̩ mʼane̩-i du ñwu me̩ ge̩.

Amo̩ya-me̩ kpai abo-me̩ egini, kpai ame̩wñukpa-me̩, ajo̩ oj ane̩ e-ki Mose̩s du ñwu me̩ ejudaba Jo̩rdan-i; ama ame̩nugbiti ku ma nʼuwohi ku ma jʼefu-me̩ chaka amʼo̩la ogu ku me̩ daba o̩gba amo̩maye-me̩, ku me̩ bʼuma che;

gbogbo taku Jihofa du uñmi ñw amo̩maye-me̩ alu kʼi du ñwu me̩, kʼama ki ño̩ mʼane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ adu ñwu ma gba ge̩; e̩gbale̩ tak ame̩ adabi tʼoj ane̩ kʼame̩ ne̩-i, ku me̩ mʼu gba, owñ chʼe-ki Mose̩s adu Jihofa du ñwu me̩ ejudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ.
Taku ma dohi ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, E̩wñ du kʼe̩ ñwa ñw a ache, ugbo du kʼe̩ kpʼuwa nyi a ale.
Alu kʼa netirʼo̩la Mose̩s ef e̩wñ du, alu le̩ a anetirʼo̩la-we̩; Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼi dʼugbo we̩ alu kʼi dʼugbo Mose̩s le̩ dee.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi alañu rʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ ñwa ñw a te̩, kʼi ma la netirʼo̩la-we̩ e̩wñ du kʼe̩ ñwa ñw u n, ekpa ma akpʼe̩ne̩ le̩ kʼi ku. Uwe̩ ki fʼeju gbiti kʼe̩ la fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ dee.
